Html:
I just blogged about new projects I've added to the Html Agility Pack version control.

http://blog.j-maxx.net/2010/06/06/NewHtmlAgilityPackVersionsAndFeatures.aspx

As a quick recap there are 4 new projects added. HAPLight for silverlight, HAPCompact for .NET CF 3.5, HtmlAgilityPack.fx.4.0 for .NET 4.0 features and HtmlAgilityPack.Tests for unit tests. The first 3 should be considered alphas and thus there will be no binary releases for them. When I feel like they've reached a usable level I will make beta binary releases for them.

i found HtmlAgilityPack.fx.4.0.csproj share the same source code in the same folder at Trunk\HtmlAgilityPack.
so source for HtmlAgilityPack.fx.4.0 is same as normal version?
